article.Heading: GST Ground Report: Here are views of small traders and shopkeepers on GST
article.Summary: Watch CNBC-TV18 and CNN-News18 reporters get the ground report on GST from small traders and shopkeepers post its launch from July 1 2017.
article.Body: Watch CNBC-TV18 and CNN-News18 reporters get the ground report on GST from small traders and shopkeepers post its launch from July 1 2017.
